Description
AddAppointmentController

FXML Controller for adding customers

FXML Controller for the application directory

Appointments class used to store the appointment data

FXML Controller for the appointments table view scene
Customers
Customers class used to store the customer data

FXML Controller for the customers table view scene
DateTime
 
DBAddAppointment
Class that holds the database queries used to add appointments
DBAddCustomers
Class that holds the database queries used to add customers
DBAppointments
Class that holds the database queries used for the appointments table view page of the application
DBClientApp
The main class of the program.
The README.txt and login_activity.txt are located in the main folder of the project.
The JavaDocs are located in the javadoc folder > index.html.
DBCustomers
Class that holds the database queries used for the customers table view page of the application
DBLogin
Class that holds the database queries used for the login page of the application
DBReports
Class that holds the database queries used for the monthType report
JDBC
Class that connections the application to the database
LoginController
FXML Controller class for the login page
Reports
Reports class used to store the report data
ReportsController
FXML Controller class for the reports that the customer can review

FXML controller for updating appointments

Users class used to store the user data
